qus: The app offers accessibility features for people with visionloss, hearing loss and other disabilities
There is sufficient color contrast between images and text.Customized loading screen is present on launch.
Activity spinner is present while content is loading.
Alerts are only for actionable information.
Consistent transition style for modal views.
Navigation feels logical, predictable and easy to follow.
User is aware of his current position and how to get to the destination.
Information can be accessed through minimum number of taps.
Familiar navigation components like page controls, tab bars, segmented controls are used.
The navigation bar shows the current position in the hierarchy of data.
Launch screen appears the moment the app starts showing progress.
App supports both portrait and landscape modes.
Request permission to access personal information, location, calendar, contacts, photos, files and folders if needed when the app starts.
Settings option is available to configure choices
